TopicTitle: How exactly do fuel lines work?

Articles.Content:
Can I connect a tank with a wing, and then make a fuel line go from that wing to an engine?

Will any part transmit fuel if I attach 2 fuel lines to that part(keeping in mind the fuel flow direction of course). I need to know or I'll waste 10 hours with the annoying fuel lines on my Skylon

Edited April 27, 2014 by iDan122

quoted from the wiki, it says: Any part connected to a fuel line will allow fuel flow, even if fuelCrossFeed = False in its CFG file. The FTX-2's links provide additional strength and stability, somewhat like the EAS-4 Strut Connector.

so maybe it does. i cant answer from personal experience though as i was too dumb to try something like that out... great idea btw
If it says in the build mode "no cross feed" then fuel lines are useless.
Please see Kasuha's thread on fuel lines
Thanks! i got it now, fuel lines won't be a problem anymore.

I'll just leave this here:

Edited April 27, 2014 by Kasuha
